definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular

sentences.english: To obtain pricing information, please contact your local service representative.
sentences.chinese: 台端如欲获取价格资讯，请联络当地服务代表。

sentences.english: Please indicate the strength of your recommendation by placing an "X" along the following scale.
sentences.chinese: 符号表示台端对申请人推荐之程度。

sentences.english: Do you have relatives or friends who currently employed by Taikoo Motors? If yes, please give details.
sentences.chinese: 台端是否有亲属在本公司任职，若有，请详述。

sentences.english: What do you expect to learn from the Module(s)?
sentences.chinese: 台端期望能从单元课程学到甚么？

sentences.english: What do you expect to learn from this Programme?
sentences.chinese: 台端期望能从本课程学到甚么？

sentences.english: You may be asked to provide further documentation.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，本处得要求台端提供别的文件。

definition: to rise to action with a determined shake of the arms
lit. on tiptoes/to look forward eagerly/to long for
lit. older brother/fig. fellow students who are successful in the imperial examinations
to fail to greet in timely manner
